Name: Description
Average Daily Shelter Population by Race:
The share of unique individuals in DHS shelters over the fiscal year, broken down by race/ethnicity of the head of household -- i.e. the race/ethnicity of the head of a family, or the race/ethnicity of a single adult.

The "Other" category includes those identifying as Native American or for which race/ethnicity was marked Unknown.

Name: Source Notes
Average Daily Shelter Population by Race: New York City Department of Homeless Services, DHS Data Dashboard (Fiscal Years 2015 - 2020); retrieved from: https://www1.nyc.gov/site/dhs/about/stats-and-reports.page.

Name: Notes
Average Daily Shelter Population by Race: This indicator differs from the Homeless Shelter Population, which measured the unique number of individuals served in the shelter system at any point over the fiscal year.
